## serialReadByte() function

This function reads a byte from the serial device.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function serialReadByte(handle: number): number;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

handle


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

The serial device handle as returned by [serialOpen()](./lgpio.serialopen.md)


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

number

0-0xFF, the value read from the device
